summary: An employee (Vijay Raaz) at a strip club kidnaps his favorite actress (Maria Goretti) to protect her from mob hit men.
cast: Vijay Raaz|Maria Goretti|Sadiya Siddiqui|Saurabh Shukla|Virendra Saxena|Vijay Patkar|Surekha Sikri|Ikhlaq Khan|Anjali Nadig|Neha Sharma|Dhruv Uday Singh|Manu Rishi Chadha|Amit Singh Kharbanda|Brijendra Kala|Vijay Kumar|Chandan Bisht|Shakeel Khan|Pranay Katke|Chandan Sanyal|Vishwa Bhanu|Dhruv Mahakashyap|Rachna Bisht|Manjushree|Krishna Raaz|Tina|Chandini|Mona|Rahul Vohra|Gurpal|Rochelle|Nagesh|Jarnail Singh|Ayesha Raza|Pritpal|Nishikant Dixit|Kavi Kumar Azad|Vinay Pathak|Samantha|Arun Verma|Vikram Rohilla|Anil Chaudhary|Nupur Asthana|Vijay Kaushik|Ravi Gossain|Anshuman|Rahul Awate|Narayan Gondal|Jyoti Gondal|Sarika|Balu|Chandan Roy Sanyal
title: Raghu Romeo
